credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Victory monument
description: Vertical rectangle. A monumental column rises upon a huge base consisting of two sections of steps which are separated by a section showing reliefs between pedestals for two statues. The column is decorated with prows and anchors. On top stands a figure upon a globe, which is supported by Atlantes. Two panoplies flank the lower section of steps.
name: Drawing
